subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Though there was not much drama in this sometimes lopsided final, it was still a big moment for Roger Federer in a year that has been long on fine play but disquietingly short on big titles.
snippet: Though there was not much drama in this sometimes lopsided final, it was still a big moment for Roger Federer in a year that has been long on fine play but disquietingly short on big titles.
